Title: The Reborn Piccolo Arrives! A Furious Freeza's 2nd Transformation
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Plot: Piccolo joins the battle in progress and quickly attacks Frieza with the strength of two Namekian warriors. The powerful villain is caught off guard, but a second transformation gives him the strength to finish the fight once and ...
